fields.description: The authentication type to connect to Common Data Service for Apps server. 'Office365' for online scenario, 'Ifd' for on-premises with Ifd scenario. 'AADServicePrincipal' for Server-To-Server authentication in online scenario, 'Active Directory' for Dynamics on-premises with IFD. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: AuthenticationType

fields.description: The deployment type of the Common Data Service for Apps instance. 'Online' for Common Data Service for Apps Online and 'OnPremisesWithIfd' for Common Data Service for Apps on-premises with Ifd. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: DeploymentType

fields.description: The Active Directory domain that will verify user credentials. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Domain

fields.description: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string.
fields.name: EncryptedCredential

fields.description: The host name of the on-premises Common Data Service for Apps server. The property is required for on-prem and not allowed for online. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: HostName

fields.description: The organization name of the Common Data Service for Apps instance. The property is required for on-prem and required for online when there are more than one Common Data Service for Apps instances associated with the user. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: OrganizationName

fields.description: The port of on-premises Common Data Service for Apps server. The property is required for on-prem and not allowed for online. Default is 443. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer), minimum: 0.
fields.name: Port

fields.description: The service principal credential type to use in Server-To-Server authentication. 'ServicePrincipalKey' for key/secret, 'ServicePrincipalCert' for certificate. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ServicePrincipalCredentialType

fields.description: The client ID of the application in Azure Active Directory used for Server-To-Server authentication. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ServicePrincipalId

fields.description: The URL to the Microsoft Common Data Service for Apps server. The property is required for on-line and not allowed for on-prem. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ServiceUri

fields.description: User name to access the Common Data Service for Apps instance. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Username
